findings.Description: The S3 bucket does not have public access block settings enabled. This could allow unintended public access to bucket contents.
Types: Software and Configuration Checks/Industry and Regulatory Standards/AWS-Foundational-Security-Best-Practices
findings.Title: S3 bucket does not have public access blocks configured

findings.Description: The S3 bucket does not have server-side encryption enabled. Data at rest should be encrypted to protect sensitive information.
Types: Software and Configuration Checks/Industry and Regulatory Standards/AWS-Foundational-Security-Best-Practices
findings.Title: S3 bucket does not have server-side encryption enabled

findings.Description: CloudTrail should be enabled in all regions to ensure complete API activity logging.
Types: Software and Configuration Checks/Industry and Regulatory Standards/AWS-Foundational-Security-Best-Practices
findings.Title: CloudTrail trail is not enabled in all regions

findings.Description: Inspector network reachability analysis found EC2 instance with unnecessary internet exposure through security group configuration.
findings.Title: Network path allows exposure to internet

findings.Description: AWS Shield detected and mitigated volumetric DDoS attack with peak of 2.3 Tbps targeting ALB endpoint.
findings.Title: DDoS attack mitigated by AWS Shield

findings.Description: Abnormal DNS query patterns suggest data exfiltration via DNS tunneling with unusually long TXT record queries.
findings.Title: DNS tunneling activity detected
